title: cellranger_count_split
description: Split 10x Cell Ranger output directory into separate output fields.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

input.description: Type: `file`, required, example: `input_dir`. Output directory from a Cell Ranger count run
input.help_text: Type: `file`, required, example: `input_dir`. Output directory from a Cell Ranger count run.

filtered_h5.description: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.filtered_h5.h5`, example: `filtered_feature_bc_matrix.h5`. Output path for the h5 file storing the filtered counts
filtered_h5.help_text: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.filtered_h5.h5`, example: `filtered_feature_bc_matrix.h5`. Output path for the h5 file storing the filtered counts.

metrics_summary.description: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.metrics_summary.csv`, example: `metrics_summary.csv`. Where to store the 'metrics_summary' CSV file
metrics_summary.help_text: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.metrics_summary.csv`, example: `metrics_summary.csv`. Where to store the 'metrics_summary' CSV file.

molecule_info.description: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.molecule_info.h5`, example: `molecule_info.h5`. Where to store Cell Ranger's 'molecule_info
molecule_info.help_text: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.molecule_info.h5`, example: `molecule_info.h5`. Where to store Cell Ranger's 'molecule_info.h5' file.

bam.description: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.bam.bam`, example: `possorted_genome_bam.bam`. Location of output BAM files
bam.help_text: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.bam.bam`, example: `possorted_genome_bam.bam`. Location of output BAM files.

bai.description: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.bai.bai`, example: `possorted_genome_bam.bam.bai`. Where to store the BAM index files
bai.help_text: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.bai.bai`, example: `possorted_genome_bam.bam.bai`. Where to store the BAM index files.

raw_h5.description: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.raw_h5.h5`, example: `raw_feature_bc_matrix.h5`. Output path for the h5 file storing the raw counts
raw_h5.help_text: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.raw_h5.h5`, example: `raw_feature_bc_matrix.h5`. Output path for the h5 file storing the raw counts.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

publish_dir.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory
publish_dir.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory.
